document.full_text: israeli prime minister benjamin netanyahu said in moscow on thursday that russia and israel will face a common threat if "radical islamist" states acquire nuclear weapons, russian news agencies reported.
document.title: netanyahu says israel, russia face common threats
lines_and_colors: israeli prime minister benjamin netanyahu said in moscow on thursday that russia and israel will face a common threat if "radical islamist" states acquire nuclear weapons, russian news agencies reported.
